name: 2XU Vectr Light Cushion Full Length Compression Socks - Unisex
categories: Vectr Light Cushion Full Length Compression S
description: Up your performance and speed up recovery with compression socks. Zoned compression panels increased blood flow and provide maximum muscle containment to keep you going longer. Increased venting on the front panels lets you pour it on without overheating, and the Polygiene® treatment ensures you won't get that dreaded foot funk.Lightweight nylon and spandex blend supports the shin, calf, ankle, Achilles and arch of the foot.Moisture-wicking yarns move moisture from the skin and the Polygiene® antibacterial finish reduces odours.Graduated compression helps improve warmup and post-exercise recovery.Anatomical left and right footbeds for improved fit and comfort.X-Lock technology wraps around foot to support arch and plantar fascia, helping foot strike and push-off.Seamless construction reduces chafing.Zoned mesh panels vent excess heat.Padded zones underfoot absorb shock.
